info.author: Thomas Paviot / Jelle Feringa
info.description: pythonocc is a python library whose purpose is to provide 3D modeling features. It is intended to developers who aim at developing CAD/PDM/PLM applications.
info.keywords: - CAD - STEP - IGES - Nurbs - Brep - Knowledge Based Engineering
info.name: pythonocc-core
info.platform: Independent. Tested on Linux, Windows, OSX.
info.summary: pythonocc-core wraps the OpenCASCADE CAD Kernel
info.html_description: pythonocc is a python library whose purpose is to provide 3D modeling features. It is intended to developers who aim at developing CAD/PDM/PLM applications.
